name: Ruby's Adventure (Jayvolt)
description:
Following a tutorial from Unity, I replicated their Ruby's Adventure tutorial. The final assignment for my Unity class was to make original and practical changes to the gameplay. The objective of the game is to help a small town by fixing robots who have gone haywire. Make sure to follow up with your frog pal Jambi!

WASD to move

C to throw a cog

X to interact with NPC's
